javelin.controller.action.maneuver

Class Maneuver

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.controller.action.Action
      • javelin.controller.action.Fire
        • javelin.controller.action.maneuver.Maneuver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, ActionDescription, AiAction
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefensiveAttack, Feint, Grapple, Trip

    public abstract class Maneuver
extends Fire
implements AiAction
    This greatly helps feature maneuvers in Javelin - it was adopted with some modifications. http://www.dnd-wiki.org/wiki/Simplified_Special_Attacks_%283. 5e_Variant_Rule%29#Trip
    Author:
    alex
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
